channel.title: MSME on John Januszczak | Fintech & Innovation Strategy
channel.description: Recent content in MSME on John Januszczak | Fintech & Innovation Strategy

item.title: Commisari
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: A B2B venture designed to streamline procurement and inventory management for the food and beverage industry including MSMEs, serving as a digital bridge between both large and small food producers and thousands of local businesses.

item.title: CashBux
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: A joint venture between UBX and AllBank that empowers MSMEs to act as ‘mobile ATMs’ offering cash withdrawals, bill payments, and card acceptance in underbanked communities.

item.title: Bux
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The UBX-backed payment gateway that boasts the country’s widest network of digital and over 50,000 over-the-counter payment touchpoints, bridging the gap between even cash-based consumers and the digital economy.

item.title: Seekcap
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The UBX-backed lending marketplace that has processed tens of billions in credit applications, closing the financing gap for over 65,000 MSMEs through same-day digital approvals.

item.title: Sentro
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: UBX-backed e-commerce platform that empowers over 30,000 Filipino merchants to build their own online stores for free, featuring integrated payments, logistics, and financing.

item.title: ERPx
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: A SaaS based, low cost ERP for tech’ing up micro and small businesses, Collecting transaction data for potential credit and digitizing payments.
